summary:
- The ModinDatabaseConnection class encapsulates a database connection using either the psycopg2 or SQLAlchemy library.
- It validates the provided library name, ensuring it is either "psycopg2" or "SQLAlchemy". 
- The class stores the library name, arguments (args) and 
```json
{
  "error": "The response exceeds the maximum allowed length of 2000 characters."
}
```
